title: [St Kilda Junction Overpass]
brief_description: Construction first began in 1970. This film explores not just the site construction but ambient shots of the surrounding traffic, footage of the W-class trams that graced the area and marvellous aerial shots of St Kilda, Albert Park and the newly constructed Dandenong Highway. (NOTE: Worksheet in HOLD file)
